ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures that the License Start Date matches the Weighted Average Start Date from the Renewed Contract for renewal opportunities before allowing the Opportunity to be closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closing'), NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator API", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__RenewedContract__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.Weighted_Average_Start_Date__c)), License_Start_Date__c <> SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.Weighted_Average_Start_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ensure License Start Date matches the Weighted Average Start Date before closing
